item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Ehsanul Hoque! I’m a software engineer and technology enthusiast living in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

I work mostly in TensorFlow , Python, C/C++ and Java.

My main interest is in server-side technology and massive scalability also I’ve been worked with other platforms such as Android, IoT Devices, etc.

Check out my GitHub page to see what I’ve been up to recently!

Contact

If you’d like to get in touch, you can find me on LinkedIn or reach me at contact@gamerrishad.com
